TopicTitle: Will there be tea and crumpets?

Articles.Content: I say chaps, will there be tea and crumpets after we land?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

I'll take a pass on the tea and crumpets, but I'll go for a pint.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
i hear there will be cake when we land ;D
The cake is a lie, Moach.

> 
> i hear there will be cake when we land ;D

I will refrain from claiming the rumor of baked goods is a falsehood.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Edit: Damn you Millsw!

> 
> I say chaps, will there be tea and crumpets after we land?

I heard it was strumpets.

Don't do it, the cake is a...\*Bleep Bleep, Sound of rapid gunfire\* Strangely Feminine Computerized Voice: don't worry, he was lying, but don't worry about that, just Get [a] Life and Do Other Stuff.

> 
> Edit: Damn you Millsw!

I have a habit of popping up everywhere when least expected. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
damn my inability to come up with the second half of the last sentence of my post above faster! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I have a habit of popping up everywhere when least expected. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Great! So now you're the Spanish Inquisition?

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOBODY EXPECTS THE SPANISH INQUISITION!

Sorry, I just had to do it. Just be glad I left out the rest of the speech! ;P

Well, there's two ways you can go with that... there's the classic

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vt0Y39eMvpI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 or the

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/X5McSEU48Y8?start=45&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 musical number.
Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

If the good Cap'n isn't going to take you up on the tea and crumpets, I'll go for those, especially if you have some honey for the crumpets. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I'll go with coffee and Guilherme-uh and cake. Even if it's a lie.
